name: They Came On Abyssal Tides
description:
A short Survival/Adventure game created in 4 weeks by a team of 10 students.

They Came on Abyssal Tides (tCoAT) allows the player to control the unnamed hero as he collects the pieces of a forgotten relic. Dodge enemy ships as they too search for the relic, but that is not the only threat that resides in the deep...

tCoAT may receive further updates as members of the dev team create new content, but this is not guaranteed.
